title: The 32 Best Gifts for Taylor Swift Fans, According to Swifties
description: Including over a dozen items straight from the pop star’s closet.
excerpt: We located the best Taylor Swift gifts for Swifties, including Kansas City Chiefs merch and the exact sneakers, bag, lipstick, and cashmere sweater Swift has worn.
text: Kansas City Chiefs MerchJunk Food Chiefs Helmet Crew SweatshirtIf the Swiftie you’re shopping for now roots for Kansas City, gift them a Chiefs sweatshirt they can wear while cheering on #87. A Themed Throw PillowFurbish Needlepoint Decorative Throw PillowTossed on a bed or sofa, this Taylor Swift-inspired throw pillow will earn endless compliments from fellow Swifties. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowThe Coveted Concert TicketsTaylor Swift Era's Tour TicketsCredit: Kevin Mazur/TAS24You’ll definitely win the gift-giving game by getting them tickets to the Era’s Tour. Swift has multiple shows on the calendar this November and December in Canada, which means this could be the perfect excuse to plan a holiday season getaway.Swift’s Game-Day NecklaceMelinda Maria Julian Loves Diamonds NecklaceSwift’s game-day Melinda Maria necklace makes a great gift for any fan, but it’s so pretty you might just want to keep it for yourself. The simulated diamonds bauble looks way more expensive than its $120 price tag. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowHer Latest AlbumTaylor Swift The Tortured Poets Department Vinyl RecordNeed a last-minute gift for a Swiftie? Round out their vinyl collection with The Tortured Poets Department record, available on Amazon with two-day Prime shipping.Swift’s Game-Day SparklesFazit Glitter Makeup PatchesSwift’s viral game-day glitter freckles will make any beauty lover swoon. Grab an extra set for yourself to complete a fun New Year’s Eve makeup look. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowThe Key to Swift’s Signature Cat-EyePat McGrath Perma Precision Liquid EyelinerFew Taylor Swift gifts are as coveted as this waterproof liquid liner from Pat McGrath. Swiftie lore says this is the exact liner the pop star wore during rainy Eras Tour rehearsals.An Eras Tour-Inspired ProjectJust My Style Friendship Bracelet Making KitSwift fans of all ages will enjoy creating Eras Tour-inspired friendship bracelets with this 1,100-piece kit. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowA Swiftie-Coded ScentSnif Instant Karma CandleIf they can’t stop singing about how “karma is the guy on the Chiefs,” they’ll be eager to light up this Midnights-coded candle. Swift’s On-Trend SneakersNew Balance 1906R SneakersReplace their worn-out sneakers with New Balance’s trendy 1906R style, which Swift was seen wearing during Eras Tour rehearsals. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowInspiration for Their Own MusicTaylor Swift Folklore: Piano-Vocal-Guitar SongbookBudding singer-songwriters will greatly appreciate this Forklore songbook featuring full lyrics and sheet music for piano and guitar.New HeadphonesBose Ultra Open EarbudsThese open-ear headphones will allow them to safely listen to their favorite artist during early morning runs and late-night walks from the campus library. Even once the year is over, they can reuse the iconic prints on their gallery wall.Her Reputation RingMazin Jewels Pave Snake RingIf the Taylor Swift fan you’re shopping for is obsessed with finding Reputation-era Easter eggs, they’ll go wild for this sparkly snake ring Swift wore on a girls’ night out in NYC.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowSwift’s Cashmere SweaterReformation Jadey Cashmere Oversized V-Neck SweaterHelp them revamp their cold-weather wardrobe with this Taylor Swift-approved cashmere sweater. They can follow Swift’s lead by styling the versatile piece with black jeans and a plaid blazer.Her Exact PumpsSam Edelman Jildie Slingback Mary Jane HeelsWhen in doubt, gift them something straight from Swift’s closet. These on-trend Mary-Janes will surely do the trick.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowA Decorative NotebookRifle Paper Co. A seasoned trend forecaster and fashion historian, she analyzes viral products and trends on a deeper level, helping readers determine what's worth buying. When she’s not writing for ELLE, Harper’s BAZAAR, Town & Country, Esquire, Cosmopolitan and other publications, she can be found roaming the Museum at FIT (her alma matter) or sewing her own couture while she binge-watches reality TV.
html:
Kansas City Chiefs Merch

Junk Food Chiefs Helmet Crew Sweatshirt

If the Swiftie you’re shopping for now roots for Kansas City, gift them a Chiefs sweatshirt they can wear while cheering on #87.

A Themed Throw Pillow

Furbish Needlepoint Decorative Throw Pillow

Tossed on a bed or sofa, this Taylor Swift-inspired throw pillow will earn endless compliments from fellow Swifties.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Coveted Concert Tickets

Taylor Swift Era's Tour Tickets

You’ll definitely win the gift-giving game by getting them tickets to the Era’s Tour. Swift has multiple shows on the calendar this November and December in Canada, which means this could be the perfect excuse to plan a holiday season getaway.

Swift’s Game-Day Necklace

Melinda Maria Julian Loves Diamonds Necklace

Swift’s game-day Melinda Maria necklace makes a great gift for any fan, but it’s so pretty you might just want to keep it for yourself. The simulated diamonds bauble looks way more expensive than its $120 price tag.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Her Latest Album

Taylor Swift The Tortured Poets Department Vinyl Record

Need a last-minute gift for a Swiftie? Round out their vinyl collection with The Tortured Poets Department record, available on Amazon with two-day Prime shipping.

Swift’s Game-Day Sparkles

Fazit Glitter Makeup Patches

Swift’s viral game-day glitter freckles will make any beauty lover swoon. Grab an extra set for yourself to complete a fun New Year’s Eve makeup look.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Key to Swift’s Signature Cat-Eye

Pat McGrath Perma Precision Liquid Eyeliner

Few Taylor Swift gifts are as coveted as this waterproof liquid liner from Pat McGrath. Swiftie lore says this is the exact liner the pop star wore during rainy Eras Tour rehearsals.

An Eras Tour-Inspired Project

Just My Style Friendship Bracelet Making Kit

Swift fans of all ages will enjoy creating Eras Tour-inspired friendship bracelets with this 1,100-piece kit.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

A Swiftie-Coded Scent

Snif Instant Karma Candle

If they can’t stop singing about how “karma is the guy on the Chiefs,” they’ll be eager to light up this Midnights-coded candle.

Swift’s On-Trend Sneakers

New Balance 1906R Sneakers

Replace their worn-out sneakers with New Balance’s trendy 1906R style, which Swift was seen wearing during Eras Tour rehearsals.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Inspiration for Their Own Music

Taylor Swift Folklore: Piano-Vocal-Guitar Songbook

Budding singer-songwriters will greatly appreciate this Forklore songbook featuring full lyrics and sheet music for piano and guitar.

New Headphones

Bose Ultra Open Earbuds

These open-ear headphones will allow them to safely listen to their favorite artist during early morning runs and late-night walks from the campus library.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

A Wall Calendar

Browntrout Taylor Swift 2025 Wall Calendar

The thing they’ll love most about this officially licensed calendar? Even once the year is over, they can reuse the iconic prints on their gallery wall.

Her Reputation Ring

Mazin Jewels Pave Snake Ring

If the Taylor Swift fan you’re shopping for is obsessed with finding Reputation-era Easter eggs, they’ll go wild for this sparkly snake ring Swift wore on a girls’ night out in NYC.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Swift’s Cashmere Sweater

Reformation Jadey Cashmere Oversized V-Neck Sweater

Help them revamp their cold-weather wardrobe with this Taylor Swift-approved cashmere sweater. They can follow Swift’s lead by styling the versatile piece with black jeans and a plaid blazer.

Her Exact Pumps

Sam Edelman Jildie Slingback Mary Jane Heels

When in doubt, gift them something straight from Swift’s closet. These on-trend Mary-Janes will surely do the trick.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

A Decorative Notebook

Rifle Paper Co. Menagerie Garden Embroidered Journal

Give the Swiftie in your life a gorgeous notebook for jotting down everything from grocery lists to song lyrics and poetry.

Swift’s Black Handbag

Aupen Nirvana Bag

What Taylor Swift fan wouldn’t want to find the pop star’s exact Aupen bag beneath the tree? Don’t forget to mention that other A-listers like Kylie Jenner, Selena Gomez, Hailey Bieber, and Beyoncé are also fans of the brand.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Swift’s Digital Camera

Olympus OM-D E-M10 Mark IV Digital Camera

Swift has been captured using this Olympus digital camera on vacation since as far back as 2015, so it’s sure to delight any Swiftie that’s into photography.

Swift’s Favorite Perfume

Tom Ford Santal Blush Eau De Parfum

Sarah Maberry is a fashion and luxury commerce editor at Hearst Magazines, where she covers fashion, beauty and pop culture. A seasoned trend forecaster and fashion historian, she analyzes viral products and trends on a deeper level, helping readers determine what's worth buying. When she’s not writing for ELLE, Harper’s BAZAAR, Town & Country, Esquire, Cosmopolitan and other publications, she can be found roaming the Museum at FIT (her alma matter) or sewing her own couture while she binge-watches reality TV.
